content:
Here‚Äôs your clean, structured markdown version with fewer emojis, while maintaining hierarchy, readability, and impact.

IT‚ÄôS DEEPER THAN CODE NEWSLETTER: 1

‚Äú2032 Is Closer Than You Think: AI, Ownership & The Creator Economy‚Äù

Welcome to the first-ever edition of the It‚Äôs Deeper Than Code Newsletter!

We are standing at a crossroads. The Intelligence Age is here, and if you don‚Äôt understand how to navigate it, you‚Äôll be left behind.

AI isn‚Äôt just changing the economy‚Äîit‚Äôs restructuring power.

It‚Äôs time to ask yourself: Will you be a builder or just a consumer?

Inside This Issue:

  • How AI, blockchain, and the creator economy are converging into a new digital wealth paradigm
  • Why ownership, not employment, is the key to surviving in 2032
  • The investment plays, skills, and strategies you need to control your financial future

Read on, or just skim the bold sections for quick insights. Either way‚Äîtake action.

THE 2032 THESIS: AI, THE CREATOR ECONOMY & THE FUTURE OF OWNERSHIP

Introduction: AI Is Changing Everything‚ÄîFast

Technology moves faster than culture, and those who understand AI, blockchain, and decentralized ownership will win.

  • OpenAI‚Äôs Super Bowl ad confirmed what insiders already knew: AI is no longer a tool‚Äîit‚Äôs the new economic foundation.
  • ByteDance‚Äôs Omnihuman-1 can turn a single image into a full-motion AI video, revolutionizing content creation and making traditional production obsolete.
  • Marvel just fired X-Men ‚Äò97 showrunner Beau DeMayo, proving that creators who don‚Äôt own their platforms will always be at the mercy of corporations.

PART 1: THE INTELLIGENCE AGE & AI-POWERED WEALTH

Key Takeaways:

  • The Information Age made people rich by giving them access to knowledge.
  • The Intelligence Age will make people rich by giving them the ability to automate decision-making.

AI will replace workers, not thinkers. The people who leverage AI to scale productivity, automate businesses, and make data-driven decisions will dominate the next decade.

How to Win in the Intelligence Age:

  • Invest in AI-related stocks and blockchain infrastructure
  • Learn how to build AI-powered businesses before AI becomes as common as Wi-Fi
  • Own the platforms, don‚Äôt just use them

The Shift in Wealth, Power & Opportunity

The Intelligence Age represents a fundamental shift in how wealth, power, and opportunity are distributed.

Unlike the Information Age, where access to knowledge created new economic classes, the Intelligence Age is about the ability to automate decision-making at scale.

  • AI will not just replace repetitive tasks‚Äîit will take over complex analytical work, disrupting industries from finance and healthcare to media and law.
  • The real winners will not just use AI but will deploy it to replace entire business functions.

The most valuable skill of the next decade will be understanding how to integrate AI into workflows that scale without human intervention.

Those who own AI-powered ecosystems will control the future.

2032 is closer than most people think. The decisions made now‚Äîwhere to invest, what skills to develop, and what platforms to build‚Äîwill determine who owns the future.

PART 2: AI-GENERATED CONTENT & THE DEATH OF GATEKEEPERS

Key Takeaways:

  • AI is changing the content creation landscape.
  • AI-generated content is already disrupting Hollywood and empowering small creators.
  • Own your IP‚Äîdon‚Äôt rely on platforms that can deplatform you.

Omnihuman-1 & The Disruption of Hollywood

ByteDance‚Äôs Omnihuman-1 can generate ultra-realistic AI humans in video from a single image.

This means:

  • Actors & influencers are replaceable‚Äîwhy pay for a model when AI can generate a perfect one?
  • AI-generated movies & YouTube content will make studio-controlled entertainment obsolete.
  • Small creators can compete with billion-dollar studios‚Äîif they understand AI.

How to Win in AI Content Creation:

  • Use AI-generated content to create media at scale
  • Own your IP‚Äîdon‚Äôt rely on platforms that can deplatform you
  • Invest in AI tools that automate production

The Big Takeaway:

AI isn‚Äôt coming for your job‚Äîit‚Äôs coming for inefficient, outdated systems. If your job relies on legacy institutions, it‚Äôs time to adapt.

PART 3: BEAU DEMAYO, X-MEN ‚Äò97 & WHY OWNERSHIP MATTERS

Key Takeaways:

  • Marvel doesn‚Äôt care about creators. Neither do most companies.
  • Beau DeMayo, the showrunner of X-Men ‚Äò97, was fired because he didn‚Äôt own the IP.
  • The Creator Economy is shifting‚Äîthose who control their media, audience, and distribution channels will win.

Marvel Doesn‚Äôt Care About Creators

Marvel‚Äôs X-Men ‚Äò97 was one of their best projects in years. The culture loved it. The fans loved it.

So what did Marvel do? They fired the showrunner, Beau DeMayo.

If you don‚Äôt own your work, you‚Äôre disposable.

How to Take Control:

  • Own your platform‚Äîbuild an email list, your own website, and decentralized content hubs.
  • Leverage blockchain for ownership‚Äîtokenized IP, smart contracts for royalties, and Web3 distribution.
  • Stop depending on companies that don‚Äôt care about you.

2032 is the decade of ownership. Get in position.

THE 2032 INVESTMENT BLUEPRINT

If you want real wealth, you need to be investing in the assets of the future.

AI & Tech Stocks:

  • NVIDIA & AMD (AI hardware & GPUs)
  • Microsoft & Google (Cloud AI dominance)
  • OpenAI & AI-powered SaaS (The next Google)

Crypto & Blockchain:

  • Bitcoin & Ethereum (The decentralized financial layer)
  • Layer-2 scaling solutions (Arbitrum, Optimism, zkSync)
  • AI-driven blockchain protocols (Worldcoin, Fetch.ai)

The Creator Economy:

  • AI-powered content creation tools (RunwayML, Midjourney, ElevenLabs)
  • Decentralized media platforms (Lens Protocol, Farcaster)
  • Personal brands that own distribution

FINAL WARNING: BUILD OR BE LEFT BEHIND

2032 isn‚Äôt some far-off sci-fi future. It‚Äôs eight years away.

  • AI will be integrated into every industry‚Äîif you‚Äôre not using it, you‚Äôll be at a disadvantage.
  • Jobs will disappear‚Äîbut those who create jobs and automate workflows will thrive.
  • Decentralization will reshape media & finance‚Äîare you building ownership now?

The Intelligence Age will produce billionaires. Will you be one of them?

NEXT STEPS: GET INVOLVED

data.excerpt: The Intelligence Age is here. AI isn‚Äôt just a tool‚Äîit‚Äôs the foundation of a new economy. This edition of the Deeper Than Code Newsletter breaks down how to position yourself for success in the next decade.
